pr_title: Return null workspace if missing flutter.json

timeline.message: Return null workspace if missing flutter.json

timeline.bodyText:
why not short circuit if the configFile == null OR readonlyRoot == null?
That should indicate we are in an environment where you can't actually run a g3 app.
timeline.author: jacob314

replies.author: helin24

timeline.message: Move config file check to after read only check
